republic_fleet_gyrostabilizer.name: Republic Fleet Gyrostabilizer
republic_fleet_gyrostabilizer.description: A rare faction gyrostabilizer issued to Republic Fleet officers. Provides superior projectile turret damage and rate of fire bonuses compared to standard Tech II variants.

caldari_navy_ballistic_control_system.name: Caldari Navy Ballistic Control System
caldari_navy_ballistic_control_system.description: A premium ballistic control system sourced from the Caldari Navy. Offers enhanced missile damage and launcher rate of fire over Tech II equivalents.

imperial_navy_heat_sink.name: Imperial Navy Heat Sink
imperial_navy_heat_sink.description: A coveted heat sink module produced for the Imperial Navy. Grants superior energy turret damage and rate of fire improvements beyond standard Tech II models.

federation_navy_magnetic_field_stabilize.name: Federation Navy Magnetic Field Stabilizer
federation_navy_magnetic_field_stabilize.description: An advanced magnetic field stabilizer procured from the Federation Navy. Delivers improved hybrid turret damage and rate of fire over Tech II counterparts.

republic_fleet_large_shield_extender.name: Republic Fleet Large Shield Extender
republic_fleet_large_shield_extender.description: A reinforced large shield extender fielded by Republic Fleet capital defense groups. Provides a substantial shield hit point increase over standard large shield extenders.

imperial_navy_energized_adaptive_nano_me.name: Imperial Navy Energized Adaptive Nano Membrane
imperial_navy_energized_adaptive_nano_me.description: An advanced adaptive nano membrane issued to Imperial Navy warships. Offers exceptional omni-resistance armor hardening, surpassing standard Tech II adaptive membranes.

caldari_navy_shield_boost_amplifier.name: Caldari Navy Shield Boost Amplifier
caldari_navy_shield_boost_amplifier.description: A high-grade shield boost amplifier developed for the Caldari Navy. Significantly increases the effectiveness of shield boosters beyond what Tech II amplifiers can achieve.

federation_navy_1600mm_armor_plate.name: Federation Navy 1600mm Steel Plates
federation_navy_1600mm_armor_plate.description: Heavy-duty 1600mm armor plates manufactured to Federation Navy specifications. Provides a massive armor hit point increase with a slightly reduced velocity penalty compared to standard plates.

tobias_modified_shield_booster.name: Tobias' Modified Large Shield Booster
tobias_modified_shield_booster.description: An extraordinarily powerful shield booster recovered from the wreckage of Tobias Kruzhor's flagship. This Guristas officer module offers unmatched shield repair capability with a rapid cycle time.

draclira_modified_energy_neutralizer.name: Draclira's Modified Heavy Energy Neutralizer
draclira_modified_energy_neutralizer.description: A devastating energy neutralizer salvaged from Draclira Merlonne's Blood Raider command ship. Drains enormous amounts of capacitor energy from targets at extended range.

cormack_modified_armor_repairer.name: Cormack's Modified Large Armor Repairer
cormack_modified_armor_repairer.description: A legendary armor repairer taken from the wreck of Cormack Vaaja's Serpentis battleship. Provides exceptional armor repair output with a very fast cycle time, making it one of the most sought-after modules in the cluster.

hakim_modified_target_painter.name: Hakim's Modified Target Painter
hakim_modified_target_painter.description: A highly modified target painter recovered from Hakim Stormare's Angel Cartel command vessel. Dramatically increases target signature radius at extreme range, making even the most agile ships vulnerable to missile and turret fire.
